item.description:
PLEASE NOTE THE DATE CHANGE

(My wife is flying in on our usual night, so I have to slide us a week back.)

This month is...Hack Night! Bring your code or question about code, or warm up your brain for thinking about solutions to other people's problems. We're totally open if you have any presentations you want to give, or have code you want to demo. Our guest network access requires support for WPA Personal so be sure to understand and or have that option when you visit, and bring your video dongles if you want to connect to the projector!

The agenda is:

1) Intro's for new folks
2) General topic discussion
3) General hacking.
4) Food & Drink (optional...but I'm definitely up for a beer or some grub after the meeting...we could break early and go if everyone seems interested.)
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the loud guy with the beard. :P
item.why: We're a nice group of geeky folks who (so far) enjoy helping one another, solving problems and sharing our discoveries.
item.name: The Metrowest Ruby Users Group April Meeting
